member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.SmoothieChart.InterpolationType
member.summary: Determines the interpolation used to draw the line.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.SmoothieChart.InterpolationType.Bezier
member.summary: Connects the points on the line using the Bezier Curve interpolation.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.SmoothieChart.InterpolationType.Linear
member.summary: Connects the points on the line using straight lines.

member.name: F:Wisej.Web.Ext.SmoothieChart.InterpolationType.Step
member.summary: Connects the points on the line using a quadratic stepped connector line.

summary.para: Implements the SmoothieChart (http://smoothiecharts.org/). A JavaScript charting library for streaming data.
